name: KWordQuiz File
summary: Learn about .KVTML files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: KWordQuiz is often used for learning words in new languages. KVTML files are also used by other programs from The KDE Education Project, including KVocTrain and Parley.
NOTE: Applications developed for The KDE Education Project run on KDE (K Desktop Environment), a desktop environment for the Linux operating system.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
